title: Focus Remote Session When Mouse is over RDP Area
author: danielniccoli
body_snippet:
It would be great if the remote session would automatically take focus when the mouse is over the RDP area.

Right now, one must always click once on the RDP area before any key strokes or keyboard shortcuts are sent to the RDP session. (If you know the VMware Remote Console, it has the same behaviour and it is incredibly helpful.)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2971735/154907124-43b0e9a3-7d8d-4013-b429-2bdc9273f773.png)
